title: 820-00239 PPBUS_G3H
message: Hi, I have this card that had a short on ppbus that I identified thanks to the Flir si C6505 the problem is that I do not have a replacement capacitor and wanting to recover it from a donor card there are only 22UF 6.3v or max 10v or 25v there are only polyester what do you recommend me to do?

title: 820-00239 PPBUS_G3H
message:
Should work without it, but is better to solder one.
You can use 10-22uF/25V; 16V may resist, but not recommended.
